patthana15.68:1.1: Niyataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Aniyataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.68:2.1: Niyataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Aniyataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve. (Abyākatamūle dve paccayavasena.)
